con:soapui-project.name: Nederlands WFS profiel WFS 2.0.0 / ISO19142
con:soapui-project.con:description: Het Nederlands profiel voor WFS 2.0.0 / ISO 19142 stelt enkele aanvuillende eisen aan een WFS service. Deze test controleert de service op deze aanvullende eisen.

xsi:type="inf:SimpleType"><inf:completed>false</inf:completed><inf:typeName>positiveInteger</inf:typeName></inf:type></inf:attribute><inf:content xsi:type="inf:EmptyContent" xmlns:map="http://mapserver.gis.umn.edu/mapserver">map:_GetStyles</inf:reference></inf:type></inf:particle><inf:prefix key="http://www.opengis.net/wms" value=""/><inf:prefix con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##HTTPGET__Description
con:property.con:value: The Capabilities advertize the HTTP GET conformance class by advertizing the KVPEncoding in the Capabilities

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##DFT__Description
con:property.con:value: The response of a DescribeFeatureType request must be an XML Schema / XSD. This is required for Simple WFS conformance.

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Metadata##MetadataURL__Description
con:property.con:value: Every FeatureType has a MetadataURL, refering to a metadata document, describing the dataset

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##GetFeature__Description
con:property.con:value: Perform a GetFeature request and test if the result contains a wfs:FeatureCollection. This is required for Simple WFS conformance.

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##GFI-Listed__Name
con:property.con:value: ListStoredQueries advertizes GetFeatureById. This is required for Simple WFS conformance.

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##GFI__Description
con:property.con:value: Test for support for GetFeatureById. This is required for Simple WFS conformance.

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##GML32__Description
con:property.con:value: Support GML 3.2 as outputformat, check the Capabilities if this is advertized as 'application/gml+xml; version=3.2'. This is required for Simple WFS conformance.

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Metadata##MD_Identifier__Description
con:property.con:value: The MD_Identifier exists in the dataset metadata

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Metadata##MD_Identifier__Name
con:property.con:value: The MD_Identifier exists in the dataset metadata

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Metadata##MD_Metadata__Description
con:property.con:value: The metadata document has root element MD_Metadata

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Metadata##MD_Metadata__Reference
con:property.con:value: ISO19139 encoding, INSPIRE Metadata Implementing Rules: Technical Guidelines based on EN ISO 19115 and EN ISO 19119

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##Schema__Description
con:property.con:value: Validate the Capabilities document against the declared schema. This schema is referenced in xsi:schemaLocation. [Disabled]

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##CheckFeatureTypes__Description
con:property.con:value: If the service does not offer featuretypes, other tests will fail or can't be executed. This test gives a warning if no featuretypes are provided by the WFS

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##GetPropValue__Description
con:property.con:value: Support GetPropertyValue. The GetPropertyValue request for this test is constructed with previous response to GetCapabilities and GetFeature requests.

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Filter-ISO19143##ComparisonOperators__Description
con:property.con:value: Capabilities advertize all ComparisonOperators: PropertyIsEqualTo, PropertyIsNotEqualTo, PropertyIsLessThan, PropertyIsGreaterThan, PropertyIsLessThanOrEqualTo, PropertyIsGreaterThanOrEqualTo

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Filter-ISO19143##GetFeatureFalseID__Description
con:property.con:value: A GetFeature response with a non-existing identifier does not contain any Features (no wfs:member returned). For conformance to Resource Identification and AdHoc Query conformance classes

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Filter-ISO19143##GetFeatureFalseID__Name
con:property.con:value: GetFeature response with non-existing identifier is empty

con:property.con:name: Conditioneel##MinTemporalFilter__Description
con:property.con:value: Capabilities advertizes ImplementsMinTemporalFilter, this is required for the support of the Minimum Temporal Filter Conformance Class

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Filter-ISO19143##PropertyIsEqualTo__Description
con:property.con:value: PropertyIsEqualTo works correctly: response contains only Features of which the first textual property contains the requested value of PropertyIsEqualTo.

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Filter-ISO19143##SpatialOperatorBBOX__Description
con:property.con:value: SpatialOperator BBOX is declared in the Capabilities

con:property.con:name: Verplicht-WFS-Filter-ISO19143__Description
con:property.con:value: Test the WFS against requirements for Filter support (ISO19143 in WFS 2.0.0 / ISO19128)

con:assertion.name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##GML32: WFS supports GML 3.2 outputformat "application/gml+xml; version=3.2"

con:configuration.content: <result>AssertionFailures: The outputformat 'application/gml+xml; version=3.2' is declared in the Capabilities.</result>

con:transfers.con:name: DescribeFeatureTypeURL

con:assertion.name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##DFT: Response contains XSD Schema element

con:configuration.content: <result>AssertionFailures: The DescribeFeatureType response is an XML Schema.</result>

con:transfers.con:name: ListStoredQueriesURL
GetFeatureURL
FirstFeatureTypeName

con:configuration.content: <result>AssertionFailures: The StoredQuery for GetFeatureById ('urn:ogc:def:query:OGC-WFS::GetFeatureById') is listed.</result>

con:transfers.con:name: FirstFeature
FirstFeatureId

con:assertion.name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##GFI-4: The gml:id of the Feature is the same for GetFeature and GetFeatureById

con:transfers.con:name: typeNames
GetFeatureURL
PropertyValueURL
ValueReferenceFromFeature
Namespaces
FirstTextualProperty
NamespacesAssertion
NamespacePrefix

con:assertion.name: Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##GetPropValue: GetPropertyValue response contains a ValueCollection
Verplicht-WFS-ISO19142##CRSSupport: each featureType is offered in a CRS from the selected list

con:configuration.content: <result>AssertionFailures: The Capabilities document advertizes support for ImplementsQuery (Query support).</result>

con:transfers.con:name: typenames
firstTextualProperty
GetPropertyValueUrl
Namespaces
NamespacePrefix
FirsttextualProperty

con:testCase.name: Resource Identification and Ad Hoc Query - Optional

con:assertion.name: Verplicht-WFS-Filter-ISO19143##GetFeatureFalseID: Response with non-existing identifier does not contain any Features (wfs:member)

con:configuration.content: <result>AssertionFailures: Response with non-existing identifier does not contain any Features (wfs:member).</result>

con:assertion.name: Verplicht-WFS-Filter-ISO19143##ComparisonOperators: Capabilities advertize all ComparisonOperators: PropertyIsEqualTo, PropertyIsNotEqualTo, PropertyIsLessThan, PropertyIsGreaterThan, PropertyIsLessThanOrEqualTo, PropertyIsGreaterThanOrEqualTo

con:transfers.con:name: FirstValue

con:assertion.name: O-02##O-02-PropertyIsEqualTo: PropertyIsEqualTo works correctly: response contains only Features of which the first textual property contains the requested value of PropertyIsEqualTo

con:configuration.content: <result>AssertionFailures: PropertyIsEqualTo works correctly: response contains only Features of which the first textual property contains the requested value of PropertyIsEqualTo.</result>

con:testCase.name: Minimum Spatial Filter - Optional
con:testCase.con:description: This test checks if the BBOX filter is advertized in the Capabilities. A more profound test, checking correctness of the execution of a BBOX filter, is out of scope. This requires knowledge of the data offered by the WFS

con:assertion.name: Verplicht-WFS-Metadata##MetadataURLs: each featuretype has a MetadataURL
Verplicht-WFS-Metadata##MD_Metadata: Metadata has root element MD_Metadata

con:configuration.content: <result>AssertionFailures: the dataset metadata has an ISO Metadata root element (gmd:Metadata exists). URL: '${#urlToTest.replace("&","&")}'</result>

con:property.con:name: etf.ignore.properties
con:property.con:value: authUser, authPwd, authMethod, FirstFeature, FirstFeatureId, GetFeatureURL, datasetIdentifiersList, featureTypeList
